<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_sg_write_back_action_item"><sys_sg_write_back_action_item action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><description/><execution_script><![CDATA[(function WriteBackAction(input) {
    //Type appropriate comment here, and begin script below
	
	var unitname = input.Unitname;

	var gr = new GlideRecord("u_alm_asset_sb");
	gr.initialize();
	
	gr.u_unitname = unitname;
	gr.insert();
	
 
})(input);]]></execution_script><name>new Field Device</name><query_condition/><sys_class_name>sys_sg_write_back_action_item</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>Jens.Gerber</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2020-01-05 17:36:38</sys_created_on><sys_id>07e9f3db1b464010901efc88cc4bcb44</sys_id><sys_mod_count>2</sys_mod_count><sys_name>new Field Device</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Field Devices Mobile" source="x_417837_field_dev">650c3c2d1b060010901efc88cc4bcba4</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Field Devices Mobile">650c3c2d1b060010901efc88cc4bcba4</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_sg_write_back_action_item_07e9f3db1b464010901efc88cc4bcb44</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>Jens.Gerber</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2020-01-05 17:45:09</sys_updated_on><table/><template/><type>script</type><use_current_record_as_condition>true</use_current_record_as_condition></sys_sg_write_back_action_item><sys_translated_text action="delete_multiple" query="documentkey=07e9f3db1b464010901efc88cc4bcb44"/></record_update>
